title: WTB Demmitt or O’Hara St. Louis. Low Grade

posts.post_title: WTB Demmitt or O’Hara St. Louis. Low Grade
posts.post_content:
If you have either please let me know. Thanks!

Scott
They don't come up too often for sale here, but they do.  I got lucky and found both of them for sale here in the last month.  Keep looking!
